subject: Soccer
World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Theo Van Seggelen, the general secretary of FIFPro, said a shift of date to a winter World Cup in 2022 would raise a host of potential  concerns for his group.
snippet: Theo Van Seggelen, the general secretary of FIFPro, said a shift of date to a winter World Cup in 2022 would raise a host of potential  concerns for his group.
